title: Perform Field Tests
description: Conduct field tests to evaluate the robot's performance.

title: Analyze Field Test Data
description: Analyze data from field tests to identify performance issues and areas for improvement.

title: Implement Improvements
description: Make necessary improvements based on field test data.

title: Document Project
description: Document the entire project including design decisions

title: Create User Manual
description: Develop a detailed user manual for GUIDE

title: Prepare Final Presentation
description: Prepare a presentation summarizing the project

title: Conduct Final Review
description: Review the project and prepare for the final presentation.

title: Conduct Market Research
description: Research existing quadrupedal robots and identify unique features and improvements.

title: Define Project Requirements
description: Outline the technical and functional requirements for GUIDE.

title: Create Project Timeline
description: Develop a detailed timeline for the project with milestones.

title: Design QDD Actuators
description: Create detailed designs for the custom QDD actuators.

title: Prototype QDD Actuators
description: Build and test prototypes of the QDD actuators.

title: Test QDD Actuators
description: Conduct performance tests on the QDD actuators.

title: Design First Leg
description: Create the initial design for the robot's first leg.

title: 3D Print Leg Components
description: 3D print the components for the first leg.

title: Assemble First Leg
description: Assemble the first leg using the printed components and QDD actuators.

title: Test First Leg
description: Conduct performance tests on the first leg.

title: Review and Refine Leg Design
description: Review test results and refine the leg design if necessary.

title: 3D Print Remaining Leg Components
description: 3D print the components for the remaining three legs.

title: Assemble Remaining Legs
description: Assemble the remaining three legs using the printed components and QDD actuators.

title: Assemble Frame
description: Assemble the carbon fiber frame for the robot.

title: Install Electronics
description: Install and wire the electronics including the ODrive controller and Teensy microcontroller.

title: Integrate Legs
description: Attach the legs to the frame and connect to the electronics.

title: Develop SLAM Algorithm
description: Develop and implement the SLAM algorithm for navigation.

title: Test SLAM
description: Test the SLAM capabilities in various environments.

title: Develop Vision CNN
description: Develop and train a convolutional neural network for visual perception.

title: Integrate Vision CNN
description: Integrate the trained vision CNN into the robot's system.

title: Develop Generative AI
description: Develop and train a generative AI model for interaction.

title: Integrate Generative AI
description: Integrate the generative AI model into the robot's system for interaction.

title: Optimize Onboard AI
description: Optimize the onboard AI for decision-making using GPU.

title: Calibrate Sensors
description: Calibrate all sensors for accurate data collection.
